title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.11 - Expiration of license at 70
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.11 - Expiration of license at 70

State Regulations
(a) All licenses or temporary permits to act as a security officer or supervisory
security officer shall expire at the end of the calendar year in which the
licensee or the holder of the permit reaches 70 years of age, unless a waiver
is obtained pursuant to section
5.7
of this Part. (b) This section shall not be applicable to a
management security officer licensed under section
5.1
(a)(3)
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
